body_html:
I am attaching the successful cmake build from a system with cuda. It seems to use the same .so file with no issues. On a system with no cuda I need instructions on how to avoid the cmake error with the find_package cuda.

make_on_system_with_GPU.zip
body_text:
I am attaching the successful cmake build from a system with cuda. It seems to use the same .so file with no issues. On a system with no cuda I need instructions on how to avoid the cmake error with the find_package cuda.
make_on_system_with_GPU.zip
body:
I am attaching the successful cmake build from a system with cuda. It seems to use the same .so file with no issues. On a system with no cuda I need instructions on how to avoid the cmake error with the find_package cuda.

[make_on_system_with_GPU.zip](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/files/1613060/make_on_system_with_GPU.zip)
